æˆ‘æ­£åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨è¯­éŸ³æµï¼Œå¹¶é€šè¿‡ replit è¿æ¥å¹¶åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªèŠå¤©æœºå™¨äººã€‚å¯¹è¯ä¸–ç•Œå¾ˆå¥½ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯å½“æˆ‘æ·»åŠ æ•°å­—æ—¶å®ƒä¸èµ·ä½œç”¨å¹¶å›å¤æ­¤é”™è¯¯ï¼Ÿ API è°ƒç”¨é”™è¯¯ - {â€œstatusâ€:400, â€œdataâ€: {â€œVF_STATUS_CODEâ€:400, â€œVF_HEADERSâ€:(â€œalt-svcâ€:â€œh3=â€:443"; ma=2592000,h3-29=â€œ:443â€; ma=2592000", â€œconnectionâ€:â€œcloseâ€, â€œcontent-lengthâ€:â€œ167â€, â€œcontent-typeâ€:â€œtext/html; charset=utf-8â€, â€œdateâ€: â€œMon, 15 Jul 2024 01:38:12 GMTâ€, â€œserverâ€:â€œWerkzeug/3.0.1 Python/3.10.14â€, â€œstrict-transport-securityâ€:â€œmax-age=63072000; includeSubDomainsâ€, â€œviaâ€:â€œ1.1 googleâ€}}> æ— æ³•åˆ›å»ºç”Ÿæˆå“åº”ï¼ æˆ‘çš„replitå‡½æ•°ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼› import json import os
def create_assistant(client): assistant_file_path = 'assistant.json'
if os.path.exists(assistant_file_path): with open(assistant_file_path, 'r') as file: assistant_data = json.load(file) assistant_id = assistant_data['assistant_id'] print("Loaded already established assistant ID.") else: file = client.files.create(file=open("knowledge.docx", "rb"), purpose='assistants')
assistant = client.beta.assistants.create(instructions=""" åŠ©æ‰‹ Investment Insight å·²è¢«ç¼–ç¨‹ä¸ºå‘æ½œåœ¨å®¢æˆ·æä¾›æœ‰å…³æ¾³å¤§åˆ©äºšæˆ¿åœ°äº§æŠ•èµ„çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚å¸®åŠ©åšå‡ºæ˜æ™ºçš„å†³å®šã€‚
""", model="gpt-4-tubro", tools=[{ "type": "retrieval" }], file_ids=[file.id])
with open(assistant_file_path, 'w') as file: json.dump({'assistant_id': assistant.id}, file) print("åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°åŠ©æ‰‹å¹¶ä¿å­˜äº† IDã€‚")
assistant_id = assistant.id
return assistant_id
